title: APB Reloaded
notes:
err:module:LdrInitializeThunk Main exe initialization for L"Z:\\home\\user\\.local\\share\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\APB Reloaded\\Launcher\\APBLauncher.exe" failed, status c0000017

Seems to require a patch to kernel32, also see https://bugs.winehq.org/show_bug.cgi?id=24125

title: APB: Reloaded
notes: Not even the launcher will start

title: APB: Reloaded
notes: crashes right back to steam, no launcher or error message.
